In this dataset

Unit of measurement
Number of people
Age
Single years, from 0 to 90
Geography
Administrative areas in the UK, including countries, regions, counties, districts and wards.
Sex
All
Male
Female
Time period
All years between 2013 and 2016

Quality and methodology information

Includes:

  • where the data comes from (source)
  • the accuracy and reliability of the data
  • the relevance of the data to certain applications or uses
  • things to consider when using the data

Read the full quality and methodology information (QMI) for this dataset.
